秜字的基本解释

秜
ní
稻谷今年落地来年自生；即稆生稻。
小麦。

秜
nì
早熟稻。

秜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
(1)稻谷落地后明年自行生长。后称穞生稻。
(2)小麦。
[②]［nì］
［《廣韻》尼質切，入質，娘。］
先熟的稻。

秜字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秜； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页851第17
【集韻】【韻會】?女夷切，音尼。【說文】稻今年落，來年自生，謂之秜。【長箋】尼訓从後至，故从尼。　又【玉篇】小麥也。　又【廣韻】力脂切【集韻】良脂切，?音棃。義同。　又【集韻】尼質切，音䁥。稻先熟者。

秜字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
秜字的起名意思

小麦。早熟稻。

秜
Basic explanation of words
秜
ní
The rice will grow on its own in the coming year; that is, rice grown on the ground.
wheat.
秜
nì
Early maturing rice.
秜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ní］［lí］
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
(1) The rice will grow on its own next year after it hits the ground. Later known as Lusheng rice.
(2) Wheat.
[②]［nì］
["Guangyun" niche cuts, enters qualitative, mother. ]
The first ripe rice.
秜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　秜; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 851 17
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Female Yi cut, Yinni. [Said the text] The rice will fall this year and will regenerate in the coming year. [Long note] Nixun comes from the back, so from Nixun.　[Jade articles] Wheat also.　[Guangyun] Lizhi cut [Jiyun] Liangzhi cut,? Yindi. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Niche is cut, and the sound is lingering. Those who ripen the rice first.
秜
